experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in a model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability and enhanced performance. Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures using CloudWatch logs. Streamlined DevOps processes with CI/CD workflows using GitHub Actions. Implemented data export/import functionality for timeseries data.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided support in production environments. Engineered GUI based workflow runs for ETL pipelines. Documented technical designs and deployed code packages.
